name: Low-Carb Bacon Cheeseburger Casserole
author: Alexis Redden
summary: Need a simple ground beef casserole to feed your family or friends? They will love this easy low-carb bacon cheeseburger casserole.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked bacon, cut into pieces
1 (12 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef with garlic and onion powder until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Spread beef onto the bottom of a 9x13-inch casserole pan
Whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl until well combined
Pour egg mixture over the beef and bacon
Top with the remaining 4 ounces cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown on top, 30 to 35 minutes
